phrases: Nana had a red tattoo on her arm.
It was the lotus flower, the flower also known as Ren...
What that flower meant to her,
of course, I had no way of knowing at the time.
When I was darkness at that time
God, I have only one request
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I want to need your love
I have got to get curtains.
I have got to get to work!
What am I going to do?!
Want To go for a walk?
Why did not you wake me up?!
- You idiot, idiot, idiot! - Why should I hafta wake you up?
The shop opens at 11 and I am late my first day!
You do not have to be at work until about ten, right?
But my alarm clock said eleven.
The clock you got yesterday at Mizukoshi's?
You mean it is broken already?
Nana, I do not think this clock is moving.
It is still at the time it was when I set it last night.
I am going to get that Mizukoshi, just as soon as I get to work.
By the way, I ate the hamburger.
You ate it all by yourself.
Well then, write do not eat on the darn thing next time!
A present for Nana From Hachi
Well then, write do not eat on the darn thing next time!
I wonder if there is a classy cafe or something like that open right now.
At this time of the morning?
I will get you some dog food at the convenience store.
I do not know which one to get!
You really do have a good nose, do not you?
Let us eat by the riverside.
We need to get a table.
The gas man's coming to open the valve today, is not he?
He said he could come in the morning.
I will be at home, so do not you worry about it.
Your stuff from home is arriving today too, is not it?
I will be there to accept it.
I have been leaving everything to you since yesterday.
I got nothing better to do anyway.
What are you going to do about work?
Do not you have to find a job?
If you are not particular, jobs are easy to come by.
I wonder if that is true.
Bought on impulse I know it is not for me to say, but...
Bought on impulse 50's headband I know it is not for me to say, but...
Bought on impulse 50's headband 70's dress and shoes I know it is not for me to say, but...
I know it is not for me to say, but...
Bought on impulse 50's headband 70's dress and shoes Has not been paid yet.
Shoji came over last night, you know.
Said you were going to be working here,
so I thought I would come by and check it out.
It is good to see you got a good job.
Oh, so Shoji went over to your place after that!
He spent the rest of the night
I really did not know what I would do
if he had gone to Sachiko's.
She is like an apprentice of the Demon Lord.
If it makes it easier to understand, she is kind of like the Muddy Mistress?
I have no idea what you are saying.
Nice to see you, I am Mizukoshi.
Oh, Mr. Mizukoshi, this is my best friend Jun-chan.
Thank you for looking after Nana.
Well actually, it is natural it will not move without batteries in it.
I guess I forgot to put batteries in the box.
I will set it for you later.
Oh, why do not you go for lunch with your friend
Your disease, it is started again.
You know the Jackson burgers are really good!
I should have known there was something going on,
you finding a job so quickly.
Did not expect such a young boss.
Hey, you know I do not care.
As long as you have a job.
Never mind the reasons for sticking to it.
Just do not give Shoji a hard time.
Like last night, too, he got drunk and started saying stuff.
Is he always saying stuff about me?
So actually, Shoji really does not like me!
Because I am good for nothing!
Shoji is so in love with you
he does not know what to do with himself.
You are not going to find a man like that just anywhere, you know that?
You got to take better care of him, man.
Otherwise, that is when heaven'll get you back.
But what do I need to do, and how, in order to take better care of him?
Actually, I thought I was taking pretty good care of him.
I wonder if I should have spent the night with him last night.
Nana, it is eight of the clock, so I am going to close up shop now.
Must have tired you out being such a slow business and all.
Just to think that I can work
amongst all this cute stuff every day from now,
As long as you do not mind.
Do you want to go for something to eat after we close up?
What do you want to have?
Is there anything you do not like?
I have other plans for tonight.
You do not have to be embarrassed.
You are that age, you are allowed to have a boyfriend or two.
Tell him to visit the shop.
I will give him a discount.
I would be in trouble if things started to look good with Mr. Mizukoshi.
Like, these thoughts alone are totally inconsiderate of Shoji.
I cannot go on living without Shoji!
Why do not I call him?
Your phone is being re-directed to the answering service center.
Call me when you get off work.
Call me when you get off work.
Just because I am in Tokyo now does not necessarily mean
Call me when you get off work.
Call me when you get off work.
that I can see Shoji any time I want.
that I can see Shoji any time I want.
Send that I can see Shoji any time I want.
that I can see Shoji any time I want.
That is natural, but it feels kind of lonely.
I should have stayed over at Shoji's last night, after all.
and he is going to start going to school now too.
He will be busier than ever.
And I have got work now.
And working is kind of tiring.
Are we not going to be able to see each other when we want?
I guess life is not so easy, after all.
I thought that if I at least made it to Tokyo, I could have everything my way.
In fact, I am getting my way, are not I?
I am on a roll, even.
But I hardly get the feeling I have grasped anything in these hands.
Besides, what is it that I really want?
cute clothes and knick-knacks... classy apartment and furniture...
Sure they are all important, but something is missing.
Am I asking for too much?
I am making a table and some chairs.
We need a table to eat on, do not we?
I will be finished in a minute, so when I am done, let us eat.
But I did not buy any groceries.
I will go get something at the convenience store!
I have made some stew, if that will do.
Oh and your things arrived, so I stuck them in your room.
I handed your guarantor papers over to Mr. Ando, too.
I did not really do anything.
Nothing's gone wrong since I got to Tokyo.
It is always fun when I am with Nana.
It is strange, because we are so different in every way.
I guess this is what they mean when people say you just click.
The size is just right for the window!
Something store-bought just would not work like this.
Hey, this is no big deal.
Besides, I got some scraps from a nearby construction site,
I got one of the young workers to help me shave the wood.
Nana, you could be a carpenter!
Why do not you look for work in that line?
but say I do this every day and then cut a finger or something.
I will not be able to the play guitar.
Hey Nana, are you looking to be a professional guitarist?
I am not good enough to make it as a pro.
But you used to play in a band, did not you?
Well yeah, but I was not the guitarist, I was a vocalist.
Tell me that after you hear me sing, man.
Yeah, I think I would like to hear her sing.
There is no doubt in my mind that she would be cool.
I will be her greatest fan, for sure.
I have been wondering, that tattoo on your arm.
I have heard tattooing is incredibly painful.
I was scared just getting my ears pierced.
A bit of pain makes it all worth doing.
Of like, being aware that you are alive?
No, actually if I had the choice, I am more the sadist.
That is the flower of the lotus, is not it?
Why did you choose the lotus?
But that is totally a lotus.
But it definitely is a lotus.
Why are you being so stubborn?
Who could it be at this time of night?
I have a delivery for you.
It could be the stuff from Yasu!
What the heck are you doing here?!
The exact response I was expecting!
- You will make a good wife, Nana.
You have the same name, but what a difference!
I thought it was a bit...
If you do not like it, leave it!
What the heck are you doing here anyway?
I came to bring you your stuff!
It was an eight-hour drive, man!
Let me stay here just one night!
- In fact, I... - I do not want to hear!
I told you, I do not want to hear it!
I have no attraction to my hometown, whatsoever.
Why do you treat him like that?
He is your friend, is not he?
You do not have to be polite to me.
I am totally used to this.
Do not expect any hospitality, but you can stay here if you like.
Nana, what are you going on about?
Now you listen to me, Nobu.
You are to follow your father's footsteps and run that huge Japanese Inn.
I did not choose to be born into that family.
Quit being a brat about it!
What is the need to throw away that happiness?!
I will not regret it in the least bit.
As long as I can play my guitar, I am happy.
And I want to play for you.
Do not make me repeat myself.
Let us just at least let him stay tonight.
Yeah, just got here a few minutes ago.
Do something about this stupid son, will ya?!
Why did you get him to bring my stuff anyway?!
Oh sorry, but he insisted that he would go.
What are you going to do about it?!
What are you going to do about it?!
There is nothing I can do about it, Nana.
Why do not you find some new band members and start over?
I know you would prefer a band to going solo.
Besides, you can write lyrics but you cannot write a tune.
Oh by the way, did ya listen to the tape?
If you sing it, in my opinion, nobody's got a chance over you guys.
Did you really write this Nobu?
I would like to try and sing it.
Oh, but I left my amp in the car!
No wonder it was so heavy.
Man, only one guest in the house tonight?
Pretty shabby if you ask me.
Oh, well, I guess that is how it is when just starting off.
I will make this a night you will never forget.
I still cannot forget that night.
There were not any words to the song yet,
so you just sang a whole bunch of nonsense.
It was almost as if someone was putting a spell on me.
I became a prisoner of that voice of yours.
your phone was the mike and the crescent moon was your spotlight.
Only you could make magic like that, Nana.
The more I close my heart
The more this love tangles up
I want a peaceful sleep for my tears
Sorry dying, falling, is my soul
Collapsing in loneliness like a little girl.
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
with your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love,.,
I want to need your love,.,
